scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.basic-instrumented: tsc Oron && node Oron assembly/index.ts assembly/oronAdvice.ts assembly/output.ts && npx asc assembly/output.ts -b build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat --validate --sourceMap --optimize && node exampleProgram.js
